articles.description: The brother of Hollywood star Zac Efron angered many after he documented his two-week hotel quarantine on social media. Now it’s been revealed why he had backing from authorities.
articles.content:
Hollywood star Zac Efrons brother was granted an exemption to enter Australia after the NSW government estimated he would pump $2 million into the film industry.
